member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Mailing.EmailHandler
member.summary: Provides static members for sending e-mails with logging and Dynamicweb system settings for mail servers.
member.remarks: Uses dropfolder if possible - otherwise fall back to direct SMTP protocol. Log can be found in /Files/Filer/MailLog/.NET/

member.summary: Sends the specified mail message.
member.returns: true if send was succesful; otherwise false.

member.summary: Saves the to the specified folder and returns the name of the file.

member.returns: The name of the saved file or String.Empty depending on the parameter.

code.title: Working with message, recipients and sending them.
code.description: Working with message, recipients and sending them.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.#ctor(Dynamicweb.Mailing.Message)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the messaging handler. This constructor should only be used when a send process is resumed.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.#ctor(Dynamicweb.Mailing.Message,Dynamicweb.Mailing.RecipientCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the messaging handler. This constructor should only be used when starting a new send process, not when resuming.

code.title: Working with message, recipients and sending them.
code.description: Working with message, recipients and sending them.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.#ctor(Dynamicweb.Mailing.Message,Dynamicweb.Mailing.RecipientCollection,Dynamicweb.Mailing.CallbackHandler)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the messaging handler. This constructor can be used wither when starting a new send process or when resuming. When resuming, the recipients argument can be null.
member.param: The callback handler to use in this context.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.Process
member.summary: Saves the to the database, if possible. If save is successful, the processing, merging and delivery of the and is started in a separate thread.
member.returns: A indicating whether the process was started successfully.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.ResumeProcess
member.summary: Resumes the process. The is fetched based on the unsent recipients in the database. This method ignores the that was passed to the constructor, if one exists.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Mailing.MessagingHandler.Preview
member.summary: Saves the to the database, if possible. If save is successful, the and are processed and merged to create a list of object to be used for Preview. This method does not start the process in a separate thread.
